updates.Name: Unban command
updates.Description: unban user using autocomplete select list

updates.Name: New audio system
updates.Description:
there are 2 commands: /addsong and /play-from.
1. send file with your music on disocrd
2. copy link to message
3. use /addsong <song title> <paste cpoied link>
4. you can now use /play-from <your nickname> <song title> to play your song on voice channel

updates.Name: Bug Fixes
updates.Description: now, after adding a bot to a new server, it automatically registers slash commands, fixed a bug where the bot crashed when trying to send a welcome message after adding a new bot to the server

updates.Name: Auto vc update
updates.Description: Added command /pass_owner @user - channel owner can pass owner rights to another user

updates.Name: Senko emojis importer
updates.Description: Added command /senko-emojis <type> to easly add some basics senko emojis to the server with once command. Required permisions - Administrator

updates.Name: Invite tracker
updates.Description: Added invite tracker. Command: /invited_by_message <channel> <status>, can also be enabled on the site. invite tracker sends information about who created the invitation that the user used to join the server

updates.Name: Discord Bot Logs
updates.Description: Fixed a bug where, after loading the dashboard, the 'Mod Logs' channel was not automatically selected if it was set. added the /bot_logs command and the BotLogs item to the dashboard Bot Logs sends bot logs to the selected channel, currently information about the use of commands from the moderation category (auto_vc, autorole, bot_logs, clear, custom_commands, link_filter, modlogs, reload, welcome) is logged. information about the use of the command, its settings and who used it will be sent to the previously selected channel

updates.Name: Discord Mod Logs
updates.Description: bug fix. users wasnt able to turn off mod logs

updates.Name: Bug Fix: Custom Commands
updates.Description: Fixed a bug that caused commands not to load after restarting the bot

updates.Name: Custom Commands
updates.Description:
custom commands have been added. At the moment they are very simple and do not allow for much, but they will be developed in the future.
using /custom_command <type:text> <slot:1/10> <trigger:ping> <response:pong> <status:True>
we can add a command that if someone writes 'ping' to the server, the bot will reply with the message 'pong'

updates.Name: Updates page
updates.Description: +a page with bot updates has been added

updates.Name: /flags command
updates.Description: +/flags and /flags_answer commands have been added, which allow you to play a mini-game of guessing which flag belongs to which country

updates.Name: Auto vc update
updates.Description: the person who created the channel becomes its owner and can set the maximum number of people on the channel

updates.Name: Auto vc
updates.Description: A system for automatic creation of voice channels has been added
